mapper.select: select * from tblnotice order by n_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into tblnotice (n_subject, n_name, n_contents) values (#{n_subject}, #{n_name}, #{n_contents})
mapper.update: update tblnotice set n_subject = #{n_subject}, n_name = #{n_name}, n_contents = #{n_contents} where n_num = #{n_num}
